adjectives.description: festivally (comparative more festivally, superlative most festivally)

entries.meaning: (informal, rare) Resembling or characteristic of a festival.
examples: So you're much more part of the community if you go out and do festivally things.

adverbs.description: festivally (comparative more festivally, superlative most festivally)

examples: These three days of Byram they spend festivally, rejoicing with abundance of illuminations all night, shooting of guns, and fireworks flying in the air; for they reckon that all their sins are now done away,  [â€¦]
